name: github-pr-template-inserter
description: Chrome extension for inserting PR templates with placeholder support

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run create-zip
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p output/icons && cp content.js manifest.json options.css options.html options.js output/ && cp icons/icon-white-*.png output/icons/
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch . --ext js,html,css,json --ignore output --ignore node_modules --exec 'npm run dev'
